name: CruiseRadioNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Follow the latest in cruise ship news and breaking stories from Cruise Radio. Updated daily. 

After enabling this skill, say things like “Alexa, what’s my flash briefing” or “Alexa, what's in the news” to hear your flash briefing. 

Go to Settings in your Alexa app and find “Flash Briefing” to move Cruise Radio News to the top of your news brief.

Give us your feedback at comments@cruiseradio.net
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
